Headline: #92 Foster Temporary Westbound Reroute near Foster/Cicero
ShortDescription: Westbound 92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted via Foster, Cicero, Elston and Foster: due to street blockage near Foster/Cicero.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted via Foster, Cicero, Elston and Foster: due to street blockage near Foster/Cicero.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #35 31st/35th Temporary Reroute near 35th/Cottage Grove
ShortDescription:
35 31st/35th buses rerouted:
EB buses via 35th, Rhodes, 33rd Pl, then recovery time at location. 
WB buses via 33rd, King Drive, 35th, resume normal route.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to construction near 35th/Cottage Grove.

Eastbound buses will operate via 35th, Rhodes, 33rd Pl., then wait recovery time at this location. 

Westbound buses will operate via 33rd, King Drive, 35th, then resume their normal route.

Allow extra travel time.
